message.content:
<<<api>>>: ImageIO.getImageWritersByFormatName
<<<code>>>: String[] formats = ImageIO.getWriterFormatNames();
for(String format : formats){
    Iterator<ImageWriter> writers = ImageIO.getImageWritersByFormatName(format);
    if(writers.hasNext()){
        ImageWriter writer = writers.next();
        // rest of your code for compression
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the ImageIO.getWriterFormatNames() method to get all the supported image formats. Then, iterate through the formats and check if there is a writer available for each format before performing the compression.
